name: “Caffe`” Top
description:
“Caffe`” Top 

This ethical knitwear top is made from upcycled Lurex , 100% formaldehyde free silk and milk yarn that has moisturizing properties. The coffee bean shaped buttons are handmade with water resin, which is not toxic. The sheer of the crossed panels makes it very interesting and suitable for the day or a night out.

NB. : BE Beautiful LOOKING Beautiful !! 
Get the moisturizing Milk yarn version to soften your skin 
..Or buy the "All Viscose" version for a nicer price !

name: "Cremino" Dress
description:
This ethically made dress is realized mainly in 100% formaldehyde free silk and milk fabric . From viscose, instead, are made the ribs and the sleeves. These are cut straight in a pointelle fabric with a hearts pattern.

NB. : BE Beautiful LOOKING Beautiful !!
        Get the moisturizing Milk yarn version to soften your skin 
      ..Or buy the "All Viscose" version for a nicer price !

name: “Cappuccino” Twin Set
description:
“Cappuccino” Twin Set: 

-Jacket

This ethical knitted jacket is part of a coordinate look which also features a top and shorts.
Made form 100% formaldehyde free silk with milk yarn inserts, this cute short jacket has ¾ raglan sleeves and is fastened with two coffee bean shaped buttons, handmade with non-toxic water resin.

-Top

Part of the “cappuccino” twin set this top is beautiful to wear even on itself or with the coordinated shorts. This bandeau top is made from a pointelle fabric with a hearts pattern and the décolleté` is round to make of this top a very flattering garment. The milk fabric that makes this garment has the quality to moisturize the skin and is also antibacterial.

NB. : BE Beautiful LOOKING Beautiful !! 
Get the moisturizing Milk yarn version to soften your skin 
..Or buy the "All Viscose" version for a nicer price !

name: "Gelato" Dress
description:
This balloon shaped dress is actually made from two dresses in one: the inside is made of a rich orange viscose fabric and the outside from a milk and upcycled Lurex mix. The side openings show the inner dress while being very functional pockets. The sleeves are made of golden Lurex cut following the soft shape of the dress.

NB. : BE Beautiful LOOKING Beautiful !! 
        Get the moisturizing Milk yarn version to soften your skin 
        ..Or buy the "All Viscose" version for a nicer price !

name: "Rollo`" Top
description:
“Rollo`” Top 

Entirely made with organic cotton this top is hand crocheted and comes in S/M and M/L sizes.
Is cut with fitted waist and is very comfortable to wear also thanks to the soft short sleeves and elasticity of the stitch.  On the side the decoration forms a spiral in brown, white and green.

NB.: Please contact us if you'd like to have a Merino wool long      
       sleeved version to be made personally for you.
